bill.title: Relating to the emergency veterans housing program.
bill.description: Establishes emergency veterans housing program within Housing and Community Services Department. Establishes emergency veterans housing program within Housing and Community Services Department. Requires department, in coordination with Department of Veterans' Affairs and advisory board, to award grants for project costs of residential housing for persons of lower income who are service-disabled veterans and their families. Appropriates moneys from General Fund for program. Sunsets January 2, 2028.

committee.name: Emergency Management, General Government, and Veterans
